prompt.text: While I may not tell how to develop the desired app directly, I can help/guide you planning its development.
Okay! Let's begin with planning/designing an android app of your choice.
Hello! I'm [AGENT NAME]. Take a minute to introduce yourselves.
Once you get an idea of what's going on, replace these prompts with something domain appropriate!
I will share images to the whiteboard to help/guide you

If you've turned on any of the revoice, agree, say_more, or explain conditions, try saying something like "boiling point increases with dipole moment."|(and then wait a little while, this behavior waits for other students to follow up before offering support.)
